sanchay.mlearning.lm.ngram.impl
Class NGramImpl

java.lang.Object
  sanchay.mlearning.lm.ngram.impl.NGramImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, NGram
public class NGramImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, NGram

The string containing words of the ngram will be the key for a Hashtable. NGram objects will be stored in the Hashtable. The Hashtable will be stored in the NGramLM object.

See Also:
